front.title: Architecture for the Artificial Intelligence Internet Protocol (AIIP)

abstract.t: This document defines the architectural model for the Artificial Intelligence Internet Protocol (AIIP), including decentralized discovery and a byte-precise native envelope. AIIP enables stateless, verifiable invocation of autonomous systems using a resolve-invoke-receipt pattern over authenticated transports. Native AIIP is the default for machine-to-machine operation; HTTPS gateways are optional for human-facing access. Each invocation produces a cryptographically verifiable execution receipt, optionally including attestation evidence.
